data.text: @cherrie_hanson We will be here for you. Life always has turns and twist. But we are here for you, family Twitter. 💕💕❤❤ Sometimes in a divorce, God has a better choice in the person to be with you, but don't put walls on there. How is God to lend his hand to you; if can't reach your hand.
@cherrie_hanson Wow. Keep fighting and take it a day at a time. Keep Shining
@cherrie_hanson You’re welcome milady and thank you so much! I will have the attitude I have because of amazing friends like you to help me make it happen! 😊😊🙏🏻🙏🏻🧡🧡💙💙🤗🤗🤗
@TheRealMCortez Thank you sir! I appreciate you and your ever positive attitude!! 🧡💙🧡💙🧡💙
@cherrie_hanson And always will be here for you Cherrie! You better believe it! Only the true friends will be by your side always! 🧡
@TheMarkMathur Thank you! I sure hope so - I’m ready.
@cherrie_hanson Here’s to a better 2022 for you, my friend (because things will get better for you)!
